```{r}

library(dplyr)

df <- read.csv("data/diabetes.csv")

```


# Lasso

```{r}
library(glmnet)

x <- df |> select(-Outcome) |> as.matrix()

lm <- cv.glmnet(x,df$Outcome, alpha = 1) # Lasso

lm_best <- which(lm$lambda == lm$lambda.min)

coef_matrix <- as.matrix(lm$glmnet.fit$beta[, lm_best])

coef_matrix 
```
# Ridge


```{r}

rm <- cv.glmnet(x,df$Outcome, alpha = 0) #ridge = 0
rm_best <- which(rm$lambda == rm$lambda.min)

rm_matrix <- as.matrix(rm$glmnet.fit$beta[, rm_best])

rm_matrix
```


```{r}

library(caret)

train_control <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)


mod <- train(Outcome ~.,
             data = df,
             method = "glmnet",
             tune_length = 25,
             preProcess = c("center", "scale"), 
             trControl = train_control)

mod

```
